title.description:
The title to use in the resulting filter list file.

To use it include {title} variable inside your header's metadata.

description.description:
The description to use in the resulting filter list file.

To use it include {description} or {about} variables inside your header's metadata.

versioning.description:
The versioning system to use in the resulting filter list file.

"auto" - inherit from the previous version of the file or let Aria decide,
"semver" - use SemVer versioning,
"timestamp" - use current Unix timestamp
